__e: Come on, Dani, time to go home.

Right. The only person that knows the desert as good as Dhani is Joseph.
Okay, this is weird, 'cause you and I just met, but, uh, Dani and I just found out we're having a boy, and I guess that's the universe's way of saying,
I just dumped a lot of stuff on Dani, and it had nothing to do with her and everything to do with me.
But then I guess he went out and got a little drunk pretty loaded, actually, and I didn't know what to do, so I told Dani, and she went out and found him.
